text:
M. S. Novik
Dear Mr. Hull:
Mr. Novik wanted me to check
with you re WE HUMAN BEINGS. We don't seem
to remember what it was all about. Will
you please supply the details? I do have a
copy of our memo to you of April 5, 1950,
but might have sent your original memo on.
P.S. Received the six copies of the NAEB
list this morning.
